SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Game

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.observer.ObservableModel<Message>
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Game
public class Game extends ObservableModel<Message>
Game is a class that represents a game it contains every method that modifies the model

    • insertPlayer

      public void insertPlayer(String nickname)
      Inserts a new player if the nickname isn't already taken

      If the game isn't from scratch, handles the reconnection of the players

      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player to add

    • setNumberOfPlayers

      public void setNumberOfPlayers(String nickname, int numberOfPlayers)
      The first player logged in chooses the number of players of the game
      Parameters:
      nickname - the players that selected the number of players
      numberOfPlayers - the number of players

    • orderSelectedItem

      public void orderSelectedItem(int position, int action)
      Handles the re-ordering of the selected items
      Parameters:
      position - the position of the item in the list
      action - 0 from ordered to pending, 1 from pending to ordered

    • confirmInsertion

      public void confirmInsertion()

    • endTurnCheck

      public boolean endTurnCheck()
      Handles the end of the turn, eventually re filling the board and checking if the game is over
      Returns:
      true if the game is over, false otherwise
